messages.message:
Hi team,
JPMC has asked whether the error banner that appears on the platform with the “Report Bug” option can be configured to point elsewhere. Currently clicking on this takes to Instabase Zendesk protal for reporting bug.

Currently, JPMC has a process where users log tickets in their internal portal, which is reviewed by their CTO team, and a Zendesk ticket is raised with Instabase only if required. To provide a seamless experience for their users, they are checking if this banner’s destination is configurable to their portal.
cc - @jade.kelly
